Your LEAST favorite monsters to ranch AND fight.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls): Monster Rancher 2 Polls: Your LEAST favorite monsters to ranch AND fight.
By Azulazulazula on Monday, January 9, 2012 - 11:57 am:

So, we all know the annoying redundanc of "OMG my Dragon izz da bst izz totes kik @$$!" and other posts along those lines. Well, this isn't another one of those posts. I want to know your LEAST favorite monsters.

So, to ranch...

Katos of any kind, shape, or form. The very thought of the little hairballs make me wanna hurl.

Pure Nagas, Naga/Zuum, and a few others drive me mad when I'm ranching.

Arrowheads...*headdesk facepalm frowny face* Low starting stats (a huge turnoff for me...yet strangely I love Gaboos and Wrackys XD), too many techniques and chains, horribly ugly, low guts regen, end of story.

Now, for fighting...

All three computer-raised Gaboos, especially MRM's mortal enemy...Oakleyman.

Computer-raised Mocchis. We've all heard this story. The little turtle-looking twits wo manage to land a diving press when the hit rate is 4%. Drives me insane.

Harikicks, Junomoule, Capella (headdesk), Susvain, Ofrey, Hyoue (double headdesk), Robeneal, Epsilon (so many headdesks that Azulazulazula dies of brain trauma), Goatrek, Caplan, Kitty, Thanatos, Most (so many freakin' headdesks that Azulazulazula gets brain trauma in Heaven, and falls into a heavenly coma).

So now, what are YOUR least favorites?

By mean2you on Thursday, January 12, 2012 - 12:20 am:

Arrowheads are my favorite to train!

I absolutely hate training suezo's even though I find them interesting.

Never bothered to raise any Naga's, doesn't interest me at all.

Nothing really bothers me to fight against.

By Screaming Feline on Friday, January 13, 2012 - 02:27 pm:

I can't stand training Hares! The little turds always run away or get hurt. Don't like Suezo's either and Hoppers make me want to scream. I do so love my Zuum's though!

By lileave on Thursday, February 16, 2012 - 05:58 pm:

I dislike Katos because you can't even get two of their attacks due to a glitch. I'd at least give one a try, but the only attack that players fear from Hyoue (Oil Fire) can't even be learned. How lame. Hoppers are dumb, and I dislike having to train them to unlock the awesome Nitons and Zillas and Undines.

Also, Oakleyman is a POS, and he's never any fun to fight, and neither is the Dokoo (Gaboo/Joker) in the S grade, whose name slips my mind.

By Azulazulazula on Saturday, March 10, 2012 - 10:40 am:

@lileave: His name is Ordorf.

By KingOfHart on Saturday, March 10, 2012 - 12:41 pm:

Mew's. I hate raising Mew's!!

By Silver Latios on Saturday, March 16, 2013 - 10:25 pm:

Coming from someone who is dragon-obsessed, I HATE raising Dragons in this game. I don't like raising negative-natured monsters in general and Dragons are the worst of the bunch, short-lived with bad guts and too many techs... I don't like battling monsters who like to one-hit-knockout.. This includes Siva and Zelandia of course(Using Dragon Combo at the start of the match before I can even attack...ugh), and the higher-rank Pixies too. I hate fighting high-Speed monsters.. It's frustrating. :/

By OgreBattle on Sunday, March 17, 2013 - 12:04 pm:

pixies. never work for me and i just hate them. i know it's cliche but i always preferred the 'cool' monsters, durahans were always my favorite.
